de.javasoft.swing.plaf.jytable
Interface IRolloverAware

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicJYTableHeaderUI, SyntheticaJYTableHeaderUI, WindowsJYTableHeaderUI
public interface IRolloverAware

Plugin to allow rollover-dependend state changes on the target.

Note: Not yet used - it's a reminder of the need to define/handle rollover in subheaders.

Method Summary
 void updateRolloverState(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
          Updates internal rollover state as appropriate for the MouseEvent.
 

Method Detail

updateRolloverState

void updateRolloverState(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Updates internal rollover state as appropriate for the MouseEvent.

Typically this method is called by MouseListeners.

Parameters:
e - the MouseEvent which might effect internal rollover state.
